# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the task list.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var title: INSpeakableString? { get }
```

## Getting the Task List Details

- **taskTitles**: An array of strings containing the titles for individual tasks to add to the new task list.
- **groupName**: The group that contains the task list.

items.description: An array of strings containing the titles for individual tasks to add to the new task list.
items.name: taskTitles

items.description: The group that contains the task list.
items.name: groupName
